venue.name: Village Center of Thompsonville -- Valley Repertory Theater

item.description:
See six brand-new 15 minute plays and vote for your favorites.  Come both Thursday and Friday evenings to see a total of twelve.  Those selected from the audience voting will be performed again on Saturday in order to allow selection of a final winner.

$15 admits you to both evenings, or $10 if you can only come to one.

 

You must order your tickets in advance, as they will likely sell out.  Order tickets by sending a check made out to Valley Rep to Valley Rep Tickets, c/o Estvanik, 14 Winter Way, Enfield, CT  06092.  Include your name, address, and phone number, e-mail optional.  Be sure to indicate how many tickets and for which nights.
item.name: 2nd Annual LabWorks 15 Minute New Play Contest
